text: What's up? what's up?
It's Mike from Kick The Grind,

and I'm actually editing the video
that you just watched,

and I wanna tell you a couple of things,
number one is,
it was a bit of an experiment for me.

Normally I record all my videos
on this camera,

but, for this particular one
I used two new toys:
a DJI Inspire 1 drone,

and this cool floating eyeball glide-cam
that I had a lot of fun with,
called the Osmo,
also by DJI.

Had a good time doing it, and
hope you enjoyed the video,
it was super fun to make.

And there's two mottos here,
number one is,
Love,

and number two is Experiences
over possessions.
Kick The Grind,
and I'll catch you guys later.
Peace!
Translated & subtitled by Luciano Orlievsky.
